feature.label: Dialog for DARPA ASKE ANSWER
feature.description: Dialog grammar and IDE is Xtext-based and is an extension of the Semantic Application Design Language (SADL). It was developed in supported of the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency ( DARPA) ASKE TA1 program under Agreement No. HR00111990006.
feature.license:
Dialog is available under the Eclipse Public License.
Dialog is built on SADL and Xtext and includes Xtext language elements used under the Eclipse Public License.
SADL includes Apache Jena licensed under Apache License V2.0: Apache Jena, Copyright 2011, 2012, 2013 The Apache Software Foundation
This product includes software developed at The Apache Software Foundation (http://www.apache.org/).
Portions of this software were originally based on the following: - Copyright 2001, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009 Hewlett-Packard Development Company, LP - Copyright 2010, 2011 Epimorphics Ltd. - Copyright 2010, 2011 Talis Systems Ltd. These have been licensed to the Apache Software Foundation under a software grant.
This product includes software developed by PluggedIn Software under a BSD license.
This product includes software developed by Mort Bay Consulting Pty. Ltd. Copyright (c) 2004-2009 Mort Bay Consulting Pty. Ltd.
SADL also includes POJava licensed under Apache License V2.0.e.]
